sentences.cn: 美国的48个互相毗连的州
加利福尼亚和墨西哥相邻.

sentences.en: California is contiguous with [ to ] Mexico.
sentences.cn: 加利福尼亚与墨西哥 相邻 .

sentences.en: Conversely, some applications represent data as a matrix of many small contiguous pieces of data.
sentences.cn: 与之相反, 有些程序把数据表示为由许多连续的小片数据组成的矩阵.

sentences.en: Discrete data is not necessarily homogeneous, and discrete selection is not necessarily contiguous.
sentences.cn: 离散数据不一定是同一类的, 离散选择也不一定是连续的.

sentences.en: Discrete data is not necessarilydiscrete selection is not necessarily contiguous.
sentences.cn: 离散选择也不一定是连续的.

sentences.en: Each program had to occupy a single contiguous block of storage locations.
sentences.cn: 程式载入主记忆体内,它必须占有连续地址的记忆体.

sentences.en: Finally we discuss contiguous mapping properties of the pairwise contiguous spaces.
sentences.cn: 其次给出配邻近空间的函数特征.

sentences.en: In contiguous selection, however, the incoming data always replaces the currently selected data.
sentences.cn: 但在连续选择中, 输入的数据总是会替换当前选中数据.

sentences.en: Its vineyards are virtually contiguous with those of Ausone.
sentences.cn: 其葡萄园差不多紧挨着欧颂堡的葡萄园。

sentences.en: Mutual exclusion is the rule in both discrete and contiguous selection.
sentences.cn: 互斥对离散选择和连续选择都适用.

sentences.en: The breadth of the contiguous zone is twelve nautical miles.
sentences.cn: 毗连区的宽度为十二海里.

sentences.en: The bridge is contiguous to the house.
They are two immediately contiguous areas.
sentences.cn: 他们是紧密接邻的地区.

sentences.en: This district is contiguous to the border.
Viet Nam is contiguous to China.

trans.tran_en: next to something, or next to each other
